name: Viaduct
description: A long bridge supported by arches provides crossing over valleys and difficult terrain. The elevated construction allows crossing where traditional bridges are impossible, while the impressive scale represents significant engineering achievement.
atmosphere: Wind howls through stone arches while distant echoes bounce off valley walls far below. The air carries the scent of stone, wind, and the promise of engineering marvel. Every surface feels elevated and impressive. Your skin feels the wind's touch and the sense of human achievement. The taste of engineering skill and elevated perspective fills your mouth.
